players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Bob, Alice, I think you're both hiding something. Charlie was a good guy and he wouldn't have been killed if it wasn't for one of us."
Bob: "Charlie was a good guy and he wouldn't have been killed if it wasn't for one of us."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
